# init(unicodeScalarLiteral:)

**Initializer**

Creates an instance initialized to the given value.

## Declaration

```swift
init(unicodeScalarLiteral value: String)
```

## Parameters

- **value**: The value of the new instance.
title: init(unicodeScalarLiteral:)
